ESIpy

Documentation

Installation¶

ESIpy can be installed through:

pip install esipython

To install PySCF, follow the official guidelines from PySCF’s installation guide:

pip install --prefer-binary pyscf

For a detailed explanation on how to run the code and how to customize it, please see Examples.
